text: Last night's triple elimination on Dancing With the Stars : Athletes sent half of the competition home, but not the contestants fans expected. Twitter erupted after controversial cast member Tonya Harding, 47, went onto next week's finale instead of fan favorites figure skater Mirai Nagasu and luger Chris Mazdzer. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Harding, known primarily for her involvement in an attack on fellow Olympian Nancy Kerrigan in 1994, has embarked on a comeback tour this year in the wake of the sympathetic biopic I, Tonya. She dedicated this week's rumba to her deceased father, who she says ` ` never abandoned me,'' and began to cry almost as soon as she took the dance floor. â€œ When everybody in the world was against me,
